console.form.eventhub.EventhubAdvancedSe: Transform data with custom Cloud Functions.
console.form.eventhub.EventhubConnection: Name of the key (policy) used for authentication.
Key for a SAS token authorization.
console.form.eventhub.EventhubSource.con: Consumer groups enable consuming applications to each have a separate view of the event stream. They read the stream independently at their own pace and with their own offsets.
console.form.eventhub.EventhubSource.sta: Starting position of an event within a partition.
